website_summaries.verdict: The best freestanding pergola you can buy for medium-to-large backyard areas.
pros: Assembly is straightforward and easy with the included instructions
Cedar wood requires no staining or extra preparation
Pergola provides a spacious area underneath

customer_reviews.title: I had it built in no time
customer_reviews.text: I built the 10 x 14 pergola in about 5 hours. The kit was relatively strIght forward. I laid everything out and staged then walked through the instructions. I’d say you want to have some assemblence of framing skills. The holes for the top slats don’t line up. Squaring it took some patience. Al in all it’s a great kit. I love the end results.
customer_reviews.author: Erick M.

customer_reviews.title: I love my new pergola! 😍
customer_reviews.text: Lovely pergola looks great for the price! Let’s hope it holds up for many, many years. Arrived in two HEAVY boxes and was easy to build. My husband, son, and son in law put it up in approximately 6 hours. I only gave it 4 stars because some of the washers were missing.
customer_reviews.author: Lizette Conover

customer_reviews.title: Sketchy packaging
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. Anything close to this was quoted for about $5-6k (in real redwood, of course) but this is fine for what it is. I stained each piece before putting it together and I think it turned out great. The packaging is sort of flimsy and one piece was broken (see photo); nothing some Gorilla glue and a clamp could not handle. With the help of my teen kids, we stained the night before and put it up the next afternoon.
customer_reviews.author: DIY-guy

customer_reviews.title: product quality-bad news
customer_reviews.text: If I could have scored "0", I would have. VERY unhappy with the product quality & installer contracted to assemble & install. Assembler tried to charge me an extra $150 because they "weren't told" it was an on patio installation (my order says it was & that's what I paid for). THEN, one side "fell to the ground caused by wind" & it was damaged beyond repair. Backyard Discovery by a vendor is not recommended!
customer_reviews.author: just a grl

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful pergola!
customer_reviews.text: It is beautiful and matches our yard perfectly! Great quality for the price! We had to get new roof beams due to them getting damaged on transport, and they immediately sent us new beams. We love it, have added solar panels on top of it to power our yard (light a pond fountain, etc). The only thing is that I wish they created mosquito netting and/or curtains.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle A

customer_reviews.title: Beautiul product!
customer_reviews.text: This pergola is gorgeous and definitely worth the money. It's sturdy and good quality. But - it does take work (and a little skill) to assemble. It took my husband and a friend (who's a professional handyman) six hours to fully assemble. You need to dig footings (or create some kind of firm foundation). Afterwards, we also sealed the wood to preserve its nice color (another hour). If you're willing and able to put in the time, assembly was fine and all parts were included. It's a really nice addition to our pool area.
customer_reviews.author: Karin K.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Pergola was a great value, assembled myself. Notables: warranty requires you maintain a polyurethane coating, also a board was damaged in shipment. With no hassle, at all, a replacement board was sent via FedEx Air, arrived quickly. If you’re mounting into concrete I’d recommend a hammer drill to create your 3/16 holes. Otherwise easy install, skill level intermediate! We also purchase the shade sail will update review when complete.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Key

customer_reviews.title: Delivery bad, product fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: The delivery man was late, alone and the box clearly stated requires two to more the box.he put it on top of my driveway and left. My husband and son-in-law had to move it to the backyard. The problem is beautiful. Very well made. Very sturdy. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: starsAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great look and quality!
customer_reviews.text: The pergola looks great! Delivery was on time, however, the thin boxes were ripped and parts were loose on the truck. We were afraid we would be missing something but all came out ok.
customer_reviews.author: Jana, Houston, Tx

customer_reviews.title: Just beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 sons assembled my pergola in about 7 hours. No problems!! I stained all the wood first so it would match my fence. I will say that the wood is very hard and I ended up wiping off a good bit of the stain. I used Ready Coat dark walnut. I am so pleased every time I look out into my backyard. Now I just need some decent furniture!!
customer_reviews.author: Barb Heaton

customer_reviews.title: More then i expected for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. A couple chips and cracks here and there, but nothing some glue and screw cant fix. Awesome product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: dw bransom IV

customer_reviews.title: Awesome pergola!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice once stained,needed 3 people to help once sub assemblies were built. Quality is good a couple of warped pieces but backyard Discovery sent new ones quick with no charge great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: matt dimarino

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I truly love this pergola. It’s sturdy and really catches people’s attention, it looks attractive and the wood is good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Reyna

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy!!
customer_reviews.text: We simply love it!!! We ended up securing the pergola to our house so we shaved off one of the pillars after building the entire thing. We love love it !!! :)
customer_reviews.author: chad casey jr

customer_reviews.title: Backyard Build
customer_reviews.text: Took a little longer than expected to build however well worth the wait! Great addition to our cozy backyard!
customer_reviews.author: Jesus A. Morales

customer_reviews.title: Looks beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVED! Very sturdy and easily survived a very cold Chicago winter!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from this. This is not good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Decided to go with this option for its price and good reviews. Pergola lasted a year. The first strong wind gust brought it down. One of the pillars cracked and now I have a big problem. Stay away from it.
customer_reviews.author: Andre Almeida

customer_reviews.title: it’s only 8 feet tall
customer_reviews.text: some of the wood was warped but it wasn’t too bad. it was a lot cheaper than the quotes i received which was 6x more . the only complaint that i have is i wish it was taller and i also wish they had a 16x16
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Bui

product_meta.title: Backyard Discovery 1802513 Wooden Sturdy Pergola, 10' x 14', Cedar Stained
product_meta.description: Even if you don't live on a sprawling property in the Mediterranean, this elegantly crafted patio accessory will have you feeling like you do. This wooden pergola's sizable capacity for crawling vines & roses conjure visions of lush vineyards surrounded by calm, Blue Seas. Its beam pattern isn't just for classic style, but also provides added stability & shade. With 63 square' Of interior space & 6' 7" Of headroom, both people & furniture of all sizes will have plenty of room to relax. All it takes is one outdoor pergola to add boundless backyard beauty.
feature_bullets: Sculptured beams provide an airy and sturdy cover.
Assembled Dimensions: 14' 0 " W x 10' 0" D x 7' 11" H | Weight: 381 lbs
Sturdy 5 1/2" Cedar upright posts with diagonal braces for added structural strength.
Durable resin foot with concrete anchors.
Color: medium brown; Some pilot-hole drilling may be required.
Manufacturer is available for any issues.
3D interactive assembly instructions for this product are available through the free BILT app.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars36 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
